description: Manage content-trust policy for Azure Container Registries.

commands.name: az acr config content-trust show
commands.summary: Show the configured content-trust policy for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr config content-trust show -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr config content-trust update
commands.summary: Update content-trust policy for an Azure Container Registry.
commands.syntax:
az acr config content-trust update --registry
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--status {disabled, enabled}]
examples: az acr config content-trust update -r myregistry --status Enabled
